text: @HealthcareResearchA new study published in The Lancet Public Health reveals concerning links between hospital privatization and decreased patient care quality. Researchers from the University of Oxford analyzed 13 longitudinal studies across multiple high-income countries, showing that privatization is associated with lower staffing levels, reduced services, and poorer health outcomes. The findings suggest a need for caution in the pursuit of privatization and emphasize the importance of prioritizing patient care. What are your thoughts on this study? Share your opinions and experiences!
